welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Scorze, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful scenery. We hope you enjoy your stay and have a chance to explore all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marco Polo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Marco Polo Airport, primarily used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free wifi for up to 2 hours per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Trissino Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Trissino Airport is responsible for the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password from the information desk.
